Articles.Content: I wonder if there is any possibility to extend antenna with RemoteTech installed without activating it? Is there any mod/MM config? I need a few antennas/dishes to extend without draining electricity (just for visual purposes). Of course I don't need those antennas to transmit data.
You just want them for looks ?
Yeah, just want em to extend and look nice. No transmission, no antenna link, no electricity drain. Just like stock.
